hopobject.name: evmonbeagle
hopobject.pname: Adapting the TI EVM 35xx BSP to the Beagle Board
hopobject.body: evmonbeagle makes it easy for Beagle Board owners to get up and running with WinCE 6 R2. TI offers a free WinCE BSP for their EVM OMAP35xx evaluation board. This project focuses on adaptions required to make this BSP run on the BeagleBoard, and potentially the Gumstix Overo.
hopobject.shortdesc: This project covers adapting the TI EVM 35xx BSP to run on the Beagle Board.
